mapper.select: SELECT A.NICKNAME AS nickname , B.USER_CODE AS userCode FROM USER_INFO A INNER JOIN USER_TABLE B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND CRYPTPACK.DECRYPT(A.PASSWORD, A.USER_ID) = #{password}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM USER_INFO WHERE NICKNAME=#{nickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM USER_INFO WHERE EMAIL=#{email}
